meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>fasten</kanji> <kanji>arc</kanji>s are arcs that go around something to fasten these things all together. What are these things? They are (<vocabulary>parentheses</vocabulary>) and [<vocabulary>brackets</vocabulary>].
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Also, watch out from the shortening.
